response.explain: The previous action code successfully executed the subtask of taking the butter from the fridge. The robot now has both the prawn and the butter in its inventory. The next step is to cook the prawn on the stove. However, the stove is currently off and needs to be turned on before the prawn can be cooked.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the fridge
(2) Take the prawn from the fridge
(3) Take the butter from the fridge
(4) Turn on the stove
(5) Cook the prawn on the stove
(6) Place the cooked prawn on the plate
(7) Place the butter on the plate
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 4: Turn on the stove
    stove = registry(env,"stove_igwqpj_0")
    toggle_on(robot, stove)
    donothing(env)
